name: harborlist-marketplace
description: HarborList boat marketplace platform with NPM workspaces, SSL-enabled local development, and centralized TypeScript definitions

scripts.dev:setup: echo 'ðŸš€ Setting up HarborList local development environment...' && docker-compose -f docker-compose.local.yml up -d dynamodb-local localstack && sleep 10 && cd backend && npm run dev:setup-db
scripts.dev:deploy:local: echo 'ðŸ”¥ Deploying enhanced local environment...' && ./tools/deployment/deploy.sh local
scripts.dev:start: echo 'ðŸŒŠ Starting HarborList development environment...' && docker-compose --profile basic -f docker-compose.local.yml up

scripts.hosts:setup:
echo '
# HarborList Local Development
127.0.0.1 local.harborlist.com
127.0.0.1 local-api.harborlist.com' | sudo tee -a /etc/hosts
